trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around March 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 7:30pm I heard a very loud roar of a low flying jet go over my house. A few minutes latter I walked outside. I glanced up and saw 2 round pulsing red lights...one fallowing the other. I was looking west and they were moving s-sw at a very fast speed. I did not hear any sound..as they grew smaller on the horizon I heard jet planes aproaching from the north going in the same direction. Thats it. I live in a very heavy air traffic area and have never seen lights like these...nor have I seen any aircraft move that fast. It is also very rare to hear jets flying so low.
